subject: Standalone test runners for JUnit4
msgSnippet: Hi, I ve been installing and looking into all possible programs listed at http://www.junit.org/news/extension/index.htm all afternoon, still I can t find any
messageBody:
Hi,

I've been installing and looking into all possible programs listed
at http://www.junit.org/news/extension/index.htm all afternoon, still
I can't find any standalone program, allowing to just choose, run and
watch the results of test in a shiny graphical GUI AND supporting
JUnit4.0.

What I'm looking for is not a IDE-plugin and I know they do the
task. I need a standalone framework which would allow my project
menager to run the tests himself, not having an IDE supporting JUnit.
Something like NUnit provides.

Any ideas?
